p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day
Nov 18 W11D3 Problem Solving 07: Translation and Rotation

problem.p: (1) During the W11D2 class you found the speed of a bowling ball when it just starts to roll without slipping by choosing a point about which angular momentum is constant. Outline a strategy for solving the same problem using torque and force methods
(2) Is the mechanical energy constant when an object is (i) rolling without slipping, (ii) skidding, (iii) slipping?
